ne10:3.3: “Dhunātha maccuno senaṃ, naḷāgāraṃva kuñjaro”ti paññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
ne10:3.6: “Dhunātha maccuno senaṃ, naḷāgāraṃva kuñjaro”ti paññindriyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
ne10:4.1: Ayuñjantānaṃ vā sattānaṃ yoge, yuñjantānaṃ vā ārambho.
ne10:5.1: Tattha ye na yuñjanti, te pamādamūlakā na yuñjanti.
ne10:5.2: So pamādo duvidho taṇhāmūlako avijjāmūlako ca.
ne10:5.3: Tattha avijjāmūlako yena aññāṇena nivuto ñeyyaṭṭhānaṃ nappajānāti pañcakkhandhā uppādavayadhammāti, ayaṃ avijjāmūlako.
ne10:5.4: Yo taṇhāmūlako, so tividho anuppannānaṃ bhogānaṃ uppādāya pariyesanto pamādaṃ āpajjati, uppannānaṃ bhogānaṃ ārakkhanimittaṃ paribhoganimittañca pamādaṃ āpajjati ayaṃ loke catubbidho pamādo ekavidho avijjāya tividho taṇhāya.
ne10:5.7: Taṃ kissa hetu, rūpīsu bhavesu ajjhosānaṃ, arūpīsu sammoho?
ne10:5.8: Tattha rūpakāyo rūpakkhandho nāmakāyo cattāro arūpino khandhā.
ne10:5.9: Ime pañcakkhandhā katamena upādānena saupādānā, taṇhāya ca avijjāya ca?
ne10:5.10: Tattha taṇhā dve upādānāni kāmupādānañca sīlabbatupādānañca.
ne10:5.12: Imehi catūhi upādānehi ye saupādānā khandhā, idaṃ dukkhaṃ.
ne10:5.15: Tesaṃ bhagavā pariññāya pahānāya ca dhammaṃ deseti dukkhassa pariññāya samudayassa pahānāya.
ne10:6.1: Tattha yo tividho taṇhāmūlako pamādo anuppannānaṃ bhogānaṃ uppādāya pariyesati, uppannānaṃ bhogānaṃ ārakkhaṇañca karoti paribhoganimittañca, tassa sampaṭivedhena rakkhaṇā paṭisaṃharaṇā, ayaṃ samatho.
ne10:7.2: Yadā jānāti kāmānaṃ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato okārañca saṃkilesañca vodānañca nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ.
ne10:7.3: Tattha yā vīmaṃsā upaparikkhā ayaṃ vipassanā.
ne10:7.4: Ime dve dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti samatho ca vipassanā ca.
ne10:7.5: Imesu dvīsu dhammesu bhāviyamānesu dve dhammā pahīyanti taṇhā ca avijjā ca, imesu dvīsu dhammesu pahīnesu cattāri upādānāni nirujjhanti.
ne10:7.6: Upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhā jātinirodho, jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti.
ne10:7.8: Iti purimakāni ca dve saccāni dukkhaṃ samudayo ca, samatho ca vipassanā ca maggo.
ne10:9.4: Yo etassa dhammassa paccayo ayaṃ avijjā.
ne10:9.6: Ime dve kilesā taṇhā ca avijjā ca.
ne10:9.7: Tāni cattāri upādānāni tehi catūhi upādānehi ye saupādānā khandhā, idaṃ dukkhaṃ.
ne10:9.10: Tesaṃ bhagavā pariññāya ca pahānāya ca dhammaṃ deseti dukkhassa pariññāya samudayassa pahānāya.
ne10:10.2: Yena taṇhānusayassa paccayaṃ avijjaṃ vārayati, ayaṃ vipassanā.
ne10:10.3: Ime dve dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti samatho ca vipassanā ca.
ne10:10.4: Tattha samathassa phalaṃ rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, vipassanāya phalaṃ avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti.
ne10:10.5: Iti purimakāni ca dve saccāni dukkhaṃ samudayo ca, samatho vipassanā ca maggo, dve ca vimuttiyo nirodho.
ne10:12.1: Sabbapāpaṃ nāma tīṇi duccaritāni kāyaduccaritaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ manoduccaritaṃ, te dasa akusalakammapathā pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro musāvādo pisuṇā vācā pharusā vācā samphappalāpo abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhi, tāni dve kammāni cetanā cetasikañca.
ne10:12.2: Tattha yo ca pāṇātipāto yā ca pisuṇā vācā yā ca pharusā vācā, idaṃ dosasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
ne10:12.3: Yañca adinnādānaṃ yo ca kāmesumicchācāro yo ca musāvādo, idaṃ lobhasamuṭṭhānaṃ, yo samphappalāpo, idaṃ mohasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
ne10:13.1: Akusalamūlaṃ payogaṃ gacchantaṃ catubbidhaṃ agatiṃ gacchati chandā dosā bhayā mohā.
ne10:13.2: Tattha yaṃ chandā agatiṃ gacchati, idaṃ lobhasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
ne10:13.3: Yaṃ dosā agatiṃ gacchati, idaṃ dosasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
ne10:13.4: Yaṃ bhayā ca mohā ca agatiṃ gacchati, idaṃ mohasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
ne10:14.1: Sabbapāpaṃ nāma aṭṭha micchattāni micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhi, idaṃ vuccati sabbapāpaṃ.
ne10:14.2: Imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ micchattānaṃ yā akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhācāro, idaṃ vuccati sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ.
ne10:15.1: Aṭṭhasu micchattesu pahīnesu aṭṭha sammattāni sampajjanti.
ne10:15.2: Aṭṭhannaṃ sammattānaṃ yā kiriyā karaṇaṃ sampādanaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati kusalassa upasampadā.
ne10:15.3: Sacittapariyodāpananti atītassa maggassa bhāvanākiriyaṃ dassayati, citte pariyodāpite pañcakkhandhā pariyodāpitā bhavanti, evañhi bhagavā āha—
ne10:15.5: Duvidhā hi pariyodāpanā nīvaraṇappahānañca anusayasamugghāto ca.
ne10:15.6: Dve pariyodāpanabhūmiyo dassanabhūmi ca, bhāvanābhūmi ca, tattha yaṃ paṭivedhena pariyodāpeti, idaṃ dukkhaṃ.
ne10:17.1: Dhammo nāma duvidho indriyasaṃvaro maggo ca.
ne10:17.2: Duggati nāma duvidhā devamanusse vā upanidhāya apāyā duggati, nibbānaṃ vā upanidhāya sabbā upapattiyo duggati.
ne10:17.3: Tattha yā saṃvarasīle akhaṇḍakāritā, ayaṃ dhammo suciṇṇo apāyehi rakkhati.
ne10:17.5: “dvemā, bhikkhave, sīlavato gatiyo devā ca manussā ca”.
ne10:17.6: Evañca nāḷandāyaṃ nigame asibandhakaputto gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
ne10:18.1: “Brāhmaṇā, bhante, pacchābhūmakā kāmaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā udakorohakā aggiparicārakā, te mataṃ kālaṅkataṃ uyyāpenti nāma, saññāpenti nāma, saggaṃ nāma okkāmenti.
ne10:18.2: Bhagavā pana, bhante, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pahoti tathā kātuṃ, yathā sabbo loko kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyā”ti.
ne10:19.1: “Tena hi, gāmaṇi, taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi, yathā te khameyya, tathā naṃ byākareyyāsīti.
ne10:20.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, idhassa puriso pāṇātipātī adinnādāyī kāmesumicchācārī musāvādī pisuṇavāco pharusavāco samphappalāpī abhijjhālu byāpannacitto micchādiṭṭhiko, tamenaṃ mahā janakāyo saṅgamma samāgamma āyāceyya thomeyya pañjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘ayaṃ puriso kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatū’ti.
ne10:20.2: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, api nu so puriso mahato janakāyassa āyācanahetu vā thomanahetuvā pañjalikaṃ anuparisakkanahetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyā”ti.
ne10:21.1: “Seyyathāpi, gāmaṇi, puriso mahatiṃ puthusilaṃ gambhīre udakarahade pakkhipeyya, tamenaṃ mahā janakāyo saṅgamma samāgamma āyāceyya thomeyya pañjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘ummujja, bho, puthusile, uplava bho puthusile, thalamuplava, bho puthusile’ti.
ne10:21.2: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, api nu sā mahatī puthusilā mahato janakāyassa āyācanahetu vā thomanahetu vā pañjalikaṃ anuparisakkanahetu vā ummujjeyya vā uplaveyya vā thalaṃ vā uplaveyyā”ti.
ne10:21.4: “Evameva kho, gāmaṇi, yo so puriso pāṇātipātī …pe…
ne10:21.5: micchādiṭṭhiko, kiñcāpi naṃ mahā janakāyo saṅgamma samāgamma āyāceyya thomeyya pañjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘ayaṃ puriso kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatū’ti.
ne10:21.6: Atha kho so puriso kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyya.
ne10:22.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, idhassa puriso pāṇātipātā paṭivirato adinnādānā paṭivirato kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato musāvādā paṭivirato pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato samphappalāpā paṭivirato anabhijjhālu abyāpannacitto sammādiṭṭhiko, tamenaṃ mahā janakāyo saṅgamma samāgamma āyāceyya thomeyya pañjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘ayaṃ puriso kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatū’ti.
ne10:22.2: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, api nu so puriso mahato janakāyassa āyācanahetu vā thomanahetu vā pañjalikaṃ anuparisakkanahetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyyā”ti.
ne10:23.1: “Seyyathāpi, gāmaṇi, puriso sappikumbhaṃ vā telakumbhaṃ vā gambhīre udakarahade ogāhetvā bhindeyya.
ne10:23.2: Tatra yāssa sakkharakaṭhalaṃ, sā adhogāmī assa.
ne10:23.3: Yañca khvassa tatra sappi vā telaṃ vā, taṃ uddhaṅgāmi assa.
ne10:23.4: Tamenaṃ mahā janakāyo saṅgamma samāgamma āyāceyya thomeyya pañjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘osīda, bho sappitela, saṃsīda, bho sappitela, adho gaccha, bho sappitelā’ti.
ne10:23.5: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi gāmaṇi, api nu taṃ sappitelaṃ mahato janakāyassa āyācanahetu vā thomanahetu vā pañjalikaṃ anuparisakkanahetu vā ‘osīdeyya vā saṃsīdeyya vā adho vā gaccheyyā’”ti.
ne10:24.1: “Evameva kho, gāmaṇi, yo so puriso pāṇātipātā paṭivirato …pe…
ne10:24.2: sammādiṭṭhiko, kiñcāpi naṃ mahā janakāyo saṅgamma samāgamma āyāceyya thomeyya pañjaliko anuparisakkeyya ‘ayaṃ puriso kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatū’”ti.
ne10:24.3: Atha kho so puriso kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyya.
ne10:24.5: Tattha yā maggassa tikkhatā adhimattatā, ayaṃ dhammo suciṇṇo sabbāhi upapattīhi rakkhati.
ne10:26.1: Tattha duggatīnaṃ hetu taṇhā ca avijjā ca, tāni cattāri upādānāni, tehi catūhi upādānehi ye saupādānā khandhā, idaṃ dukkhaṃ.
ne10:26.3: Pañcakkhandhā dukkhaṃ, tesaṃ bhagavā pariññāya ca pahānāya ca dhammaṃ deseti dukkhassa pariññāya samudayassa pahānāya.
ne10:26.6: Pañcindriyāni rūpīni rakkhanto samādhiṃ bhāvayati, taṇhañca niggaṇhāti.
ne10:26.7: Manindriyaṃ rakkhanto vipassanaṃ bhāvayati, avijjañca niggaṇhāti.
ne10:26.8: Taṇhāniggahena dve upādānāni pahīyanti kāmupādānañca sīlabbatupādānañca.
ne10:26.9: Avijjāniggahena dve upādānāni pahīyanti diṭṭhupādānañca attavādupādānañca.
ne10:26.10: Catūsu upādānesu pahīnesu dve dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti samatho ca vipassanā ca.
ne10:27.1: Tattha brahmacariyassa phalaṃ cattāri sāmaññaphalāni sotāpattiphalaṃ sakadāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ arahattaṃ aggaphalaṃ.
ne10:27.3: Iti purimakāni ca dve saccāni dukkhaṃ samudayo ca.
ne10:27.4: Samatho ca vipassanā ca brahmacariyañca maggo, brahmacariyassa phalāni ca tadārammaṇā ca asaṅkhatādhātu nirodho.
ne10:28.1: Tattha yaṃ paṭivedhena rakkhati, idaṃ dukkhaṃ.
